Name: ACCELERATION
Description: The measurement of the rate of change of velocity.

Name: ACCUMULATED_TIME
Description: The measurement of accumulated time for an activity or event.

Name: ACTIVE_AXES
Description: The set of axes currently associated with a {model:Path} or {model:Controller} {term:Structural Element}.

Name: ACTUATOR_STATE
Description: Represents the operational state of an apparatus for moving or controlling a mechanism or system.

Name: ALARM
Description: *DEPRECATED:* Replaced with {model:CONDITION} category data items in Version 1.1.0.

Name: AMPERAGE
Description: The measurement of electrical current.

Name: ANGLE
Description: The measurement of angular position.

Name: ANGULAR_ACCELERATION
Description: The measurement rate of change of angular velocity.

Name: ANGULAR_VELOCITY
Description: The measurement of the rate of change of angular position.

Name: ASSET_CHANGED
Description: The value of the {term:CDATA} for the event *MUST* be the {model:assetId} of the asset that has been added or changed. There will not be a separate message for new assets.

Name: ASSET_REMOVED
Description: The value of the {term:CDATA} for the event *MUST* be the {model:assetId} of the asset that has been removed. The asset will still be visible if requested with the {model:includeRemoved} parameter as described in the protocol section. When assets are removed they are not moved to the beginning of the most recently modified list.

Name: AVAILABILITY
Description: Represents the {term:Agent}'s ability to communicate with the data source.

Name: AXIS_COUPLING
Description:
Describes the way the axes will be associated to each other. 
  
 This is used in conjunction with {model:COUPLED_AXES} to indicate the way they are interacting.

Name: AXIS_FEEDRATE
Description: The measurement of the feedrate of a linear axis.

Name: AXIS_FEEDRATE_OVERRIDE
Description: The value of a signal or calculation issued to adjust the feedrate of an individual linear type axis.

Name: AXIS_INTERLOCK
Description: An indicator of the state of the axis lockout function when power has been removed and the axis is allowed to move freely.

Name: AXIS_STATE
Description: An indicator of the controlled state of a {model:Linear} or {model:Rotary} component representing an axis.

Name: BLOCK
Description: The line of code or command being executed by a {model:Controller} {term:Structural Element}.

Name: BLOCK_COUNT
Description: The total count of the number of blocks of program code that have been executed since execution started.

Name: CAPACITY_FLUID
Description: The fluid capacity of an object or container.

Name: CAPACITY_SPATIAL
Description: The geometric capacity of an object or container.

Name: CHUCK_INTERLOCK
Description: An indication of the state of an interlock function or control logic state intended to prevent the associated {model:CHUCK} component from being operated.

Name: CHUCK_STATE
Description: An indication of the operating state of a mechanism that holds a part or stock material during a manufacturing process. It may also represent a mechanism that holds any other mechanism in place within a piece of equipment.

Name: CLOCK_TIME
Description: The value provided by a timing device at a specific point in time.

Name: CLOSE_CHUCK
Description: Service to close a chuck.

Name: CLOSE_DOOR
Description: Service to close a door.

Name: CODE
Description: *DEPRECATED* in Version 1.1.

Name: COMMUNICATIONS
Description: An indication that the piece of equipment has experienced a communications failure.

Name: COMPOSITION_STATE
Description: An indication of the operating condition of a mechanism represented by a {model:Composition} type element.

Name: CONCENTRATION
Description: The measurement of the percentage of one component within a mixture of components

Name: CONDUCTIVITY
Description: The measurement of the ability of a material to conduct electricity.

Name: CONTROLLER_MODE
Description: The current operating mode of the {model:Controller} component.

Name: CONTROLLER_MODE_OVERRIDE
Description: A setting or operator selection that changes the behavior of a piece of equipment.

Name: COUPLED_AXES
Description: Refers to the set of associated axes.

Name: CUTTING_SPEED
Description: The speed difference (relative velocity) between the cutting mechanism and the surface of the workpiece it is operating on.

Name: DATA_RANGE
Description: An indication that the value of the data associated with a measured value or a calculation is outside of an expected range.

Name: DATE_CODE
Description:
The time and date code associated with a material or other physical item.
  
 {model:DATE_CODE} *MUST* be reported in ISO 8601 format.

Name: DENSITY
Description: The volumetric mass of a material per unit volume of that material.

Name: DEPOSITION_ACCELERATION_VOLUMETRIC
Description: The rate of change in spatial volume of material deposited in an additive manufacturing process.

Name: DEPOSITION_DENSITY
Description: The density of the material deposited in an additive manufacturing process per unit of volume.

Name: DEPOSITION_MASS
Description: The mass of the material deposited in an additive manufacturing process.

Name: DEPOSITION_RATE_VOLUMETRIC
Description: The rate at which a spatial volume of material is deposited in an additive manufacturing process.

Name: DEPOSITION_VOLUME
Description: The spatial volume of material to be deposited in an additive manufacturing process.

Name: DEVICE_UUID
Description:
The identifier of another piece of equipment that is temporarily associated with a component of this piece of equipment to perform a particular function.
  
 The {term:Valid Data Value} *MUST* be a NMTOKEN XML type.

Name: DIRECTION
Description: The direction of motion.

Name: DISPLACEMENT
Description: The measurement of the change in position of an object.

Name: DOOR_STATE
Description: The operational state of a {model:DOOR} type component or composition element.

Name: ELECTRICAL_ENERGY
Description: The measurement of electrical energy consumption by a component.

Name: EMERGENCY_STOP
Description: The current state of the emergency stop signal for a piece of equipment, controller path, or any other component or subsystem of a piece of equipment.

Name: END_OF_BAR
Description: An indication of whether the end of a piece of bar stock being feed by a bar feeder has been reached.

Name: EQUIPMENT_MODE
Description: An indication that a piece of equipment, or a sub-part of a piece of equipment, is performing specific types of activities.

Name: EQUIPMENT_TIMER
Description: The measurement of the amount of time a piece of equipment or a sub-part of a piece of equipment has performed specific activities.

Name: EXECUTION
Description: The execution status of the {model:Controller}.

Name: FILL_LEVEL
Description: The measurement of the amount of a substance remaining compared to the planned maximum amount of that substance.

Name: FLOW
Description: The measurement of the rate of flow of a fluid.

Name: FREQUENCY
Description: The measurement of the number of occurrences of a repeating event per unit time.

Name: FUNCTIONAL_MODE
Description: The current intended production status of the device or component.

Name: GLOBAL_POSITION
Description: *DEPRECATED* in Version 1.1

Name: HARDNESS
Description: The measurement of the hardness of a material.

Name: HARDWARE
Description: An indication of a fault associated with the hardware subsystem of the {term:Structural Element}.

Name: INTERFACE_STATE
Description: An indication of the operational state of an {model:Interface} component.

Name: LENGTH
Description: The measurement of the length of an object.

Name: LEVEL
Description: *DEPRECATED* in Version 1.2.  See {model:FILL_LEVEL}

Name: LINE
Description: *DEPRECATED* in Version 1.4.0.

Name: LINEAR_FORCE
Description: The measurement of the push or pull introduced by an actuator or exerted on an object.

Name: LINE_LABEL
Description: An optional identifier for a {model:BLOCK} of code in a {model:PROGRAM}.

Name: LINE_NUMBER
Description: A reference to the position of a block of program code within a control program.

Name: LOAD
Description: The measurement of the actual versus the standard rating of a piece of equipment.

Name: LOGIC_PROGRAM
Description: An indication that an error occurred in the logic program or programmable logic controller (PLC) associated with a piece of equipment.

Name: MASS
Description: The measurement of the mass of an object(s) or an amount of material.

Name: MATERIAL
Description: The identifier of a material used or consumed in the manufacturing process.

Name: MATERIAL_CHANGE
Description: Service to change the type of material or product being loaded or fed to a piece of equipment.

Name: MATERIAL_FEED
Description: Service to advance material or feed product to a piece of equipment from a continuous or bulk source.

Name: MATERIAL_LAYER
Description:
Identifies the layers of material applied to a part or product as part of an additive manufacturing process.
  
 The {term:Valid Data Value} *MUST* be an integer.

Name: MATERIAL_LOAD
Description: Service to load a piece of material or product.

Name: MATERIAL_RETRACT
Description: Service to remove or retract material or product.

Name: MATERIAL_UNLOAD
Description: Service to unload a piece of material or product.

Name: MESSAGE
Description: Any text string of information to be transferred from a piece of equipment to a client software application.

Name: MOTION_PROGRAM
Description: An indication that an error occurred in the motion program associated with a piece of equipment.

Name: OPEN_CHUCK
Description: Service to open a chuck.

Name: OPEN_DOOR
Description: Service to open a door.

Name: OPERATOR_ID
Description: The identifier of the person currently responsible for operating the piece of equipment.

Name: PALLET_ID
Description: The identifier for a pallet.

Name: PART_CHANGE
Description: Service to change the part or product associated with a piece of equipment to a different part or product.

Name: PART_COUNT
Description: The count of parts produced.

Name: PART_DETECT
Description:
An indication designating whether a part or work piece has been detected or is present.
  
 The {term:Valid Data Value} *MUST* be {model:PRESENT} or {model:NOT_PRESENT}.

Name: PART_ID
Description: An identifier of a part in a manufacturing operation.

Name: PART_NUMBER
Description:
An identifier of a part or product moving through the manufacturing process. 
 The {term:Valid Data Value} *MUST* be a text string.

Name: PATH_FEEDRATE
Description: The measurement of the feedrate for the axes, or a single axis, associated with a {model:Path} component-a vector.

Name: PATH_FEEDRATE_OVERRIDE
Description: The value of a signal or calculation issued to adjust the feedrate for the axes associated with a {model:Path} component that may represent a single axis or the coordinated movement of multiple axes.

Name: PATH_FEEDRATE_PER_REVOLUTION
Description: The feedrate for the axes, or a single axis.

Name: PATH_MODE
Description: Describes the operational relationship between a {model:Path} {term:Structural Element} and another {model:Path} {term:Structural Element} for pieces of equipment comprised of multiple logical groupings of controlled axes or other logical operations.

Name: PATH_POSITION
Description: A measured or calculated position of a control point associated with a {model:Controller} element, or {model:Path} element if provided, of a piece of equipment.

Name: PH
Description: A measure of the acidity or alkalinity of a solution.

Name: POSITION
Description: A measured or calculated position of a {model:Component} element as reported by a piece of equipment.

Name: POWER_FACTOR
Description: The measurement of the ratio of real power flowing to a load to the apparent power in that AC circuit.

Name: POWER_STATE
Description: The indication of the status of the source of energy for a {term:Structural Element} to allow it to perform its intended function or the state of an enabling signal providing permission for the {term:Structural Element} to perform its functions.

Name: POWER_STATUS
Description: *DEPRECATED* in Version 1.1.0.

Name: PRESSURE
Description: The measurement of force per unit area exerted by a gas or liquid.

Name: PROCESS_TIME
Description:
The time and date associated with an activity or event.
  
 {model:PROCESS_TIME} *MUST* be reported in ISO 8601 format.

Name: PROCESS_TIMER
Description: The measurement of the amount of time a piece of equipment has performed different types of activities associated with the process being performed at that piece of equipment.

Name: PROGRAM
Description: The name of the logic or motion program being executed by the {model:Controller} component.

Name: PROGRAM_COMMENT
Description:
A comment or non-executable statement in the control program.
 The {term:Valid Data Value} *MUST* be a text string.

Name: PROGRAM_EDIT
Description:
An indication of the status of the {model:Controller} components program editing mode. 
 On many controls, a program can be edited while another program is currently being executed.

Name: PROGRAM_EDIT_NAME
Description:
The name of the program being edited. 
 This is used in conjunction with {model:PROGRAM_EDIT} when in {model:ACTIVE} state. 
 The {term:Valid Data Value} *MUST* be a text string.

Name: PROGRAM_HEADER
Description: The non-executable header section of the control program.

Name: PROGRAM_LOCATION
Description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for the source file associated with {model:PROGRAM}.

Name: PROGRAM_LOCATION_TYPE
Description:
Defines whether the logic or motion program defined by {model:PROGRAM} is being executed from the local memory of the controller or from an outside source.
  
 The {term:Valid Data Value} *MUST* be {model:LOCAL} or {model:EXTERNAL}.

Name: PROGRAM_NEST_LEVEL
Description:
An indication of the nesting level within a control program that is associated with the code or instructions that is currently being executed.
  
 If an Initial Value is not defined, the nesting level associated with the highest or initial nesting level of the program *MUST* default to zero (0).
  
 The value reported for {model:PROGRAM_NEST_LEVEL} *MUST* be an integer.

Name: RESISTANCE
Description: The measurement of the degree to which a substance opposes the passage of an electric current.

Name: ROTARY_MODE
Description: The current operating mode for a {model:Rotary} type axis.

Name: ROTARY_VELOCITY
Description: The measurement of the rotational speed of a rotary axis.

Name: ROTARY_VELOCITY_OVERRIDE
Description:
The value of a command issued to adjust the programmed velocity for a {model:Rotary} type axis.
 This command represents a percentage change to the velocity calculated by a logic or motion program or set by a switch for a {model:Rotary} type axis.

Name: SERIAL_NUMBER
Description: The serial number associated with a {model:Component}, {model:Asset}, or {model:Device}. The {term:Valid Data Value} *MUST* be a text string.

Name: SOUND_LEVEL
Description: The measurement of a sound level or sound pressure level relative to atmospheric pressure.

Name: SPINDLE_INTERLOCK
Description: An indication of the status of the spindle for a piece of equipment when power has been removed and it is free to rotate.

Name: SPINDLE_SPEED
Description: *DEPRECATED* in Version 1.2.  Replaced by {model:ROTARY_VELOCITY}

Name: STRAIN
Description: The measurement of the amount of deformation per unit length of an object when a load is applied.

Name: SYSTEM
Description: A general purpose indication associated with an electronic component of a piece of equipment or a controller that represents a fault that is not associated with the operator, program, or hardware.

Name: TEMPERATURE
Description: The measurement of temperature.

Name: TENSION
Description: The measurement of a force that stretches or elongates an object.

Name: TILT
Description: The measurement of angular displacement.

Name: TOOL_ASSET_ID
Description: The identifier of an individual tool asset.The {term:Valid Data Value} *MUST* be a text string.

Name: TOOL_GROUP
Description: An identifier for the tool group associated with a specific tool. Commonly used to designate spare tools.

Name: TOOL_ID
Description: *DEPRECATED* in Version 1.2.0.   See {model:TOOL_ASSET_ID}. *DEPRECATED:The identifier of the tool currently in use for a given {model:Path}.*

Name: TOOL_NUMBER
Description:
The identifier assigned by the {model:Controller} component to a cutting tool when in use by a piece of equipment. 
 The {term:Valid Data Value} *MUST* be a text string.

Name: TOOL_OFFSET
Description: A reference to the tool offset variables applied to the active cutting tool associated with a {model:Path} in a {model:Controller} type component.

Name: TORQUE
Description: The measurement of the turning force exerted on an object or by an object.

Name: USER
Description: The identifier of the person currently responsible for operating the piece of equipment.

Name: VARIABLE
Description: A data value whose meaning may change over time due to changes in the opertion of a piece of equipment or the process being executed on that piece of equipment.

Name: VELOCITY
Description: The measurement of the rate of change of position of a {model:Component}.

Name: VISCOSITY
Description: The measurement of a fluids resistance to flow.

Name: VOLTAGE
Description: The measurement of electrical potential between two points.

Name: VOLT_AMPERE
Description: The measurement of the apparent power in an electrical circuit, equal to the product of root-mean-square (RMS) voltage and RMS current (commonly referred to as VA).

Name: VOLT_AMPERE_REACTIVE
Description: The measurement of reactive power in an AC electrical circuit (commonly referred to as VAR).

Name: VOLUME_FLUID
Description: The fluid volume of an object or container.

Name: VOLUME_SPATIAL
Description: The geometric volume of an object or container.

Name: WAIT_STATE
Description:
An indication of the reason that {model:EXECUTION} is reporting a value of {model:WAIT}.
  
 The {term:Valid Data Value} *MUST* be {model:POWERING_UP}, {model:POWERING_DOWN}, {model:PART_LOAD}, {model:PART_UNLOAD}, {model:TOOL_LOAD}, {model:TOOL_UNLOAD}, {model:MATERIAL_LOAD}, {model:MATERIAL_UNLOAD}, {model:SECONDARY_PROCESS}, {model:PAUSING}, or {model:RESUMING}.

Name: WATTAGE
Description: The measurement of power flowing through or dissipated by an electrical circuit or piece of equipment.

Name: WIRE
Description: A string like piece or filament of relatively rigid or flexible material provided in a variety of diameters.

Name: WORKHOLDING_ID
Description:
The identifier for the current workholding or part clamp in use by a piece of equipment. 
 The {term:Valid Data Value} *MUST* be a text string.

Name: WORK_OFFSET
Description: A reference to the offset variables for a work piece or part associated with a {model:Path} in a {model:Controller} type component.
